column1: # Title: Ternary discrimination diagrams of magmatic rocks
# Description: dataset of various geological classification domains for magmatic rocks in ternary diagram

# Ewart1982: Ewart A (1982) The mineralogy and petrology of Tertiary-Recent orogenic volcanic rocks: with special reference to the andesitic-basaltic compositional range p25-95 in Thorp RS ed. Andesites: Orogenic Andesites and Related rocks John Wiley and Sons New York 724 p
# LeBas1986: LeBas MJ LeMaitre RW Streckeisen A and Zanettin B (1986) A chemical classification of volcanic rocks based on the total alkali-silica diagram Journal of Petrology 27:745-750
# Winchester1977: Winchester JA and Floyd PA (1977) Geochemical discrimination of different magma series and their differentiation products using immobile elements Chemical Geology 20:325-343
# Values are reported form references or using WebPlotDigitizer (http://arohatgi.info/WebPlotDigitizer/beta/)
# x = left corner y = top corner z = right corner
